segment.source: Minimum requirements for Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection
segment.target: Minimum requirements for Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection

segment.source: Minimum network and data storage configuration, endpoint hardware and software requirements, and deployment channel requirements for Windows Defender ATP.
segment.target: Minimum network and data storage configuration, endpoint hardware and software requirements, and deployment channel requirements for Windows Defender ATP.

segment.source: Minimum requirements for Windows Defender ATP
segment.target: Minimum requirements for Windows Defender ATP

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: There are some minimum requirements for onboarding your network and endpoints.
segment.target: There are some minimum requirements for onboarding your network and endpoints.

segment.source: Minimum requirements
segment.target: Minimum requirements

segment.source: Network and data storage and configuration requirements
segment.target: Network and data storage and configuration requirements

segment.source: When you run the onboarding wizard for the first time, you must choose where your Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection-related information is stored: in either a European or United States datacenter.
segment.target: When you run the onboarding wizard for the first time, you must choose where your Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection-related information is stored: in either a European or United States datacenter.

segment.source: Notes
segment.target: Notes

segment.source: You cannot change your data storage location after the first-time setup.
segment.target: You cannot change your data storage location after the first-time setup.

segment.source: Review the Windows Defender ATP data storage and privacy for more information on where and how Microsoft stores your data.
segment.target: Review the Windows Defender ATP data storage and privacy for more information on where and how Microsoft stores your data.

segment.source: Endpoint hardware and software requirements
segment.target: Endpoint hardware and software requirements

segment.source: Endpoints on your network must be running Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later.
segment.target: Endpoints on your network must be running Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later.

segment.source: The hardware requirements for Windows Defender ATP on endpoints is the same as those for Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later.
segment.target: The hardware requirements for Windows Defender ATP on endpoints is the same as those for Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later.

segment.source: Note Endpoints that are running Windows Server and mobile versions of Windows are not supported.
segment.target: Note Endpoints that are running Windows Server and mobile versions of Windows are not supported.

segment.source: Internet connectivity on endpoints is also required.
segment.target: Internet connectivity on endpoints is also required.

segment.source: See Configure Windows Defender ATP endpoint proxy and Internet connectivity settings for additional proxy configuration settings.
segment.target: See Configure Windows Defender ATP endpoint proxy and Internet connectivity settings for additional proxy configuration settings.

segment.source: Before you configure endpoints, the telemetry and diagnostics service must be enabled.
segment.target: Before you configure endpoints, the telemetry and diagnostics service must be enabled.

segment.source: The service is enabled by default in Windows 10, but if it has been disabled you can turn it on by following the instructions in the Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection onboarding issues section.
segment.target: The service is enabled by default in Windows 10, but if it has been disabled you can turn it on by following the instructions in the Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection onboarding issues section.

segment.source: Deployment channel operating system requirements
segment.target: Deployment channel operating system requirements

segment.source: You can choose to onboard endpoints with a scheduled Group Policy (GP) or System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM) update (using a configuration package that you download from the portal or during the service onboarding wizard), or by manually running a script to modify the registry.
segment.target: You can choose to onboard endpoints with a scheduled Group Policy (GP) or System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM) update (using a configuration package that you download from the portal or during the service onboarding wizard), or by manually running a script to modify the registry.

segment.source: The following describes the minimum operating system or software version required for each deployment channel.
segment.target: The following describes the minimum operating system or software version required for each deployment channel.

segment.source: Deployment channel
segment.target: Deployment channel

segment.source: Minimum server requirements
segment.target: Minimum server requirements

segment.source: Group Policy settings
segment.target: Group Policy settings

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: System Center Configuration Manager
segment.target: System Center Configuration Manager

segment.source: SCCM 2012
segment.target: SCCM 2012

segment.source: Manual (script)
segment.target: Manual (script)

segment.source: No minimum requirements
segment.target: No minimum requirements
